name: Fire Tube Boiler VR
description:
An industrial Fire Tube Boiler VR simulation  shows the  starting and shutdown steps of a Fire Tube boiler in an safe and controllable environment.  

This project a one scene in a much bigger project made for an educational institution lab with a PC stand alone operator which controllers all and monitors of the PCVR app  via a local networking solution.

The original project consisted of 16 scenes:

  •  Fire Tube Boiler assembly process.
  •  Fire Tube Boiler disassembly process. 
  •  Water Tube Boiler assembly process.
  •  Water Tube Boiler disassembly process. 
  •  Burner assembly process.
  •  Burner disassembly process. 
  • Economizer assembly process.
  •  Economizer disassembly process. 
  •  Fire Tube Boiler information scene.
  •  Water Tube Boiler information scene.
  •  Fire Tube Boiler examination scene.
  •  Water Tube Boiler examination scene.
  • Fire Tube Boiler operation scene.
  • Water Tube Boiler operation scene.
  • Fire Tube Boiler inspection and maintenance scene.
  • Water Tube Boiler inspection and maintenance scene.

The Boiler were modeled by Eisa Noori.
